title: riot you really nerf ap xin?
body:
0.7 ap ratio to 0.5 .......
like ap xin you ever or ever have been strong. even with the new jungle item it will not anywhere near op.... just interesting. you nerf him before item changes.... why not nerf rumble then? or vlad? tell me that play ratio of ap xin? the win rate? its stupid semi troll build. why you kill ap xin? i don't get it.
delet tank ekko or tank smite fizz top first. that is played in lcs. ap xin is not even played in lcs... I'm so disappointed

replies.body: me too :( miss my ap rek sai
I miss Rek'marine'sai =(. She was so fun. Then rito was like "uh no. we didn't build her to be a sniper, so you are not allowed to play as one". I almost left tbh >.> Almost.
Dat name LOL

I seriously **_hate_** when the community has a kneejerk reaction to a nerf done for a very legitimate reason (in this case, sated devourer on the PBE was making him heal a shitload every 2 AAs) I hate it when the community forgets that it's a complex games and that Riot doesn't just nerf to nerf.

They nerfed ADC Kennen by reducing his range and base AD

I'm still sad {{item:3070}}

They nerfed it because of the new devourer... come on guys if you read PBE look back on stuff...
They will probably nerf some other on-hit passives (non come to mind right away) if they see they become really strong after
AND HEY its still PBE

> [{quoted}](name=KoKoboto,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-01T03:51:44.068+0000)
>
> They nerfed it because of the new devourer... come on guys if you read PBE look back on stuff...
> They will probably nerf some other on-hit passives (non come to mind right away) if they see they become really strong after
> AND HEY its still PBE

But meddler said that the balance team doesn't try to do preemptive nerfs. 
So, yeah, if they're going to nerf ap xin zhao then they should nerf everyone else too who will be stronger with the item.

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=00060002,timestamp=2015-07-01T16:13:51.892+0000)
>
> But meddler said that the balance team doesn't try to do preemptive nerfs. 
> So, yeah, if they're going to nerf ap xin zhao then they should nerf everyone else too who will be stronger with the item.

Yeah w/e they did a preemptive nerf now
It isn't a preemptive nerf. It's already been deemed OP in internal testing. Y'know, the testing that happens _before_ something is pushed to PBE.
Except he doesn't build devourer. He doesn't benefit from on-hits and he isn't good at farming the jungle. He usually builds warrior.

Except Warrior Xins don't care about this change.

This only affects AP Xins who stack AP and on-hit effects, specifically what this change targets.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-07-01T04:46:52.042+0000)
>
>He doesn't benefit from on-hits

Actually, his W's passive is an on-hit. Like Vayne's W. Or Gnar's.

> [{quoted}](name=KoKoboto,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-01T03:51:44.068+0000)
>
> They nerfed it because of the new devourer... come on guys if you read PBE look back on stuff...
> They will probably nerf some other on-hit passives (non come to mind right away) if they see they become really strong after
> AND HEY its still PBE

But the new devourer doesn't give AP so why nerf the ap ratio? .-.
AP Xin with a Sated Devourer would heal crazy amounts of damage, as long as he can attack he'd be unkillable.
I think we deserved the chance to see the difference.

they nerfed him because he was seen in the Lcs. 

"Xin, what are you doing in the lsc?!"
" {{champion:5}} : what do you mean?"
"You're supposed to stay with Zac and Zyra."
" {{item:3070}} {{champion:5}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=QuitTouchin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-01T00:45:07.070+0000)
>
> they nerfed him because he was seen in the Lcs. 
> 
> "Xin, what are you doing in the lsc?!"
> " {{champion:5}} : what do you mean?"
> "You're supposed to stay with Zac and Zyra."
> " {{item:3070}} {{champion:5}} {{item:3070}}

but zac was played by azingy

That's a bummer. I like off builds.

Whenever I play an off AP mage I think of [this.](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XF-MDuXXiSI)

Riot hates off meta builds. 

They can't balance the game when they force every slot to build the same 6 items in various orders. 

How can they hope to contain the might of AP xin?
lets nerf every ap ratio!!
Then if it goes that way better nerf {{champion:39}} , oh nvm she's not meant to be a jungler, but she'll steal heal 46 with Sated devourer and deal 150 true damages per auto.
That seems like a pretty good nerf for **Tank Xin Zhao**, since that was the only builds LCS were doing on him.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-30T23:22:40.229+0000)
>
> That seems like a pretty good nerf for **Tank Xin Zhao**, since that was the only builds LCS were doing on him.

dumbest comment I have seen. this nerf affects tank xin in no way whatsoever. use your brain lol

> [{quoted}](name=Dracid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-07-01T00:20:40.337+0000)
>
> dumbest comment I have seen. this nerf affects tank xin in no way whatsoever. use your brain lol

Let me help you. Add Kappa after his comment.
tell me how net ap ratios is a nerf to tank xin :)? please inform me of some secret tank ap build ?
Because he was played in the LCS only with tank builds? Since you did proposed you want tank Fizz & Ekko to be nerfed? Im just explaining the same logic.
How does tank xin have to do anything with AP ratios? (In a large sense)

Lol:

{{champion:150}} why does his ult need AP ratio
{{champion:75}} why does his E need AP ratio
{{champion:72}} why does his E need AP ratio
{{champion:59}} why does his E need AP ratio

If their AP Ratios were nerfed however, their tank builds wouldn't be affect much. That's my point.

If Riot wanted to nerf TANK Xin, they wouldn't of nerfed just his AP ratios.
o god.. impossible to reason with you. xin in lcs and xin in solo q build zero ap why its dose zero for dose build to nerf his pa ratios. its only ap xin that it hits
Sarcasm is an amazing thing.
It's probably not intended to be an AP Xin nerf (unless they said so, but I see no link) rather just to nerf some of the healing should he go Triforce.

That's literally a nerf of 6 hp every 3 autos.  If they were going for ad/tank xin they would have nerfed the base heal.  AP xin usually built a lot of ap so he could 1 v 1 towers and the nerf could lower the healing by 200 depending on the build
like xin even build or will build tf next patch.... they don't nerf tf xin.... would make no sens at all. its clearly only for ap xin

With the new item, it'd be a 70% AP ratio heal every other autoattack. Thats arguably the best heal in the game, given how much AP you can get.

AP Xin isn't... exactly a thing. But when it's played, he's famous for just tanking turrets and such, right?
Now take that and double it.

I can definitely see how it would be a problem.

but its his only ap ratio with e... his mid game is user trash and he is super item depended as ap. devour will also make the ap build super and until its fully stacked and he really need dcap and some mr armor items to function or he just insta dies in team fights. i really cant se him be anywhere  near problematic. I just cant.

He got a nerf, when not suing the new super devourer. 
He is total stronger with it.

The heal gose off every 3rd strike? Okay,
Lets just look at {{item:3085}} {{item:3087}} combo.
instead of 10 stacks, 30 stacks per AA.

He will be getting 3 stacks every 2 hits.... So in six hits, he gets 150% heal

The old, 140% in six hits...

I'd hate to see a 210% heal on Yas...
lol? wtf i just read? what have runnan and shiv  to do with this?

It lets Xin proc his basic attack on 3 targets and charge shiv faster and... and...

{{item:3085}} **(RANGED ONLY)** Derp

> [{quoted}](name=ekko or feed,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEAR1wRN,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2015-07-01T20:44:35.338+0000)
>
> lol? wtf i just read? what have runnan and shiv  to do with this?

Each AA you do, with {{item:3085}} {{item:3087}} gives you 30 stacks instead of ten.
Im using that combo as contrast.

Using that math, of the new Devourer, AP Yas has more total healing with the phantom striking...

Because doing point-and-click damage and healing for absurd amounts of damage at the same time is extremely toxic and uninteractive.

{{champion:8}}

Point and click damage and healing?
Oh are we talking about ADC's with their life steal and point ant click auto attacks of doom?

Just tiny reminder that Teemo lost 0.3 ap ratio on his mushrooms (from 0,8 to 0,5) just because of Liandrys.

I wonder how would playerbase react if Riot were to nerf Jinx/ez/Lee ultimates ratios by 0,3. We'd witness riot at Riot boards for sure.

So AP Xin could take on towers and heal a ton in 1v1's, so? His earlygame was awful with low AP and AD and this guy:
{{champion:75}} basically completely shut him down
At least compensate his meta build then lol

So you suggest deleting a certain build from a champion (like smite fizz) Please tell me how you plan on doing that, or how Riot should delete a certain build from a champion because I'm pretty sure anyone can build whatever they want, or is it just me who has access to all the items in the shop all the time (minus the smite items)

you argumentation is super flawed. with the logic i can say you can build 6 seraph embrace on riven. with delete builds and can build i mean builds that are playable in a ranked game that actually works. i don't mean that smite top fizz should be unplayable i just mean it should not be the strongest way to play him in the highest level of play. its should be some niche solo q build. 
and ap xin is not specially good and we will not see any crazy ap xin win rates or him played in lcs as ap if they remove the nerf on pbe. that nerf is just so unnecessary.

Well you didn't say "make tank fizz unplayable you said" Delete smite Fizz top, and I didn't say anything about AP xin, or his or anyone else's viability in competitive play or solo que. I said that there's no point in asking riot to "delete cinder-Fizz" and I asked you how Riot should go about it, you didn't even answer that. You just talked about argumentation, something about Riven building AP, talked about Fizz in a totally different (and extremely unclear) way than in your post and then went in to some random spiel about AP xin for whatever reason, tell me, whose argument is flawed?
